column3: Thanks for the fix! Please add a tiny improvement and I'll merge it in.

Thanks @traff.
I don't understand, what should I add as an improvement?
Sorry, for some reason my comment is lost. Could you please write the path of the rcfile that is loaded to the message that is printed.

@traff Your comment is not lost, I've just clicked on "resolve the conversation" as I added the path of the rcfile to the printed message. I amended my previous commit, for avoiding making two commits. You can check the actual code ;)
